Messages.WelcomeDescription:
Greetings! üëã
 Thank you for adding me here!

 My prefix is ‚Äã‚Äã`{0}`, or you can just mention me - {1}.
 The list of commands can be viewed through `{0}help`.
 You also can get support on our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/zfBffbBbCp).

 Here is a brief overview of my options:
Messages.WelcomeMusic:
You can order tracks from YouTube, SoundCloud, YaMusic and many other services.
 You can control playback through emojis and using commands. You can create and order your own playlists and much more. List of Music Commands - `{0}help music`
Messages.WelcomeLogging:
The bot collects a detailed history and can display all message changes in one place. If necessary, export the log to the image.
 Changes to messages do not clog the log channel, instead the entire history is exported when the message is deleted.
 To enable log collection, write `{0}enablelogging true`. To see the change history, put :book: under the desired message or use the command `{0}help history`
Messages.WelcomeLocalization: You can change the bot response language with `{0}language`
Messages.WelcomeInfo:
`{0}help setchannel` - to assign a role to channels (without this, logging will not send reports when a message is deleted, for example)
 `{0}help setprefix` - to change the bot prefix
 `{0}stats` and `{0}userstats` - to view statistics
 `{0}invite` - to receive bot's invitation link
Messages.WelcomeGithub: If **you find an error**, you want to help with localizations or you **have an idea** - open [issue](https://gitlab.com/skprochlab/nJMaLBot/-/issues) or create [Merge Request](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/project/merge_requests/creating_merge_requests.html) on [our GitLab](https://gitlab.com/skprochlab/nJMaLBot)!

Localization.Success: Successfully changed the bot language to `{0}`

MusicQueues.NodeChanged: **{0}** moves playback to a new node: `{1}`
MusicQueues.LimitExceed: **{0}** made `{1}` requests that were not fully processed. The queue already contains {2} tracks
MusicQueues.PlaylistLoadingLimit: **{0}** cannot load playlist with `{1}` tracks inside. Queue cannot contains more than {2} tracks
MusicQueues.QueuePageDescription:
‚èÆÔ∏è‚è≠Ô∏è to move to the beginning or end 
‚óÄÔ∏è‚ñ∂Ô∏è to move to the next or previous page 
üóÉÔ∏è to export to a file
MusicQueues.QueueDeprecated: The queue has changed, this queue message is not relevant. To view the queue again, use the `{0} queue`

Music.QueueEmpty: The queue is empty. Order tracks via `{0}play [request]`
Music.UserStopPlayback:
**{0}** stopped playback

Help us by voting (`vote` command)
Music.NoListenersLeft:
Playback stopped - no listeners or tracks left

Help us by voting (`vote` command)
Music.TrackIndexWrong: {0}, the playlist does not have a track with the index `{1}`. The valid value is from `1` to `{2}`
Music.PlaybackMoved: The playback bar has been moved to the music channel - <#{0}>
Music.OtherVoiceChannel: {0}, You must be in the same voice channel as the bot
Music.NotInVoiceChannel: {0}, You must be in a voice channel
Music.ChannelNotAllowed: {0}, you can‚Äôt play music on this channel. Use <#{1}> for this, or ask the administrator to change this through the server setup.
Music.MusicDisabled: The bot does not have access to any Lavalink server and cannot play anything. Write to the host owner about this problem.
Music.ClusterInitializing: The playback cluster is initializing. Wait a bit
Music.NoNodesAvailable: There are currently no nodes available for playback. Most likely you need to wait a bit
Music.PlayerDropped: Unfortunately, the node that served your playback has crashed
Music.PlayerMoved: The node that served your playback has crashed. We resumed it on another node.
Music.PlaylistSaved:
Playlist saved. ID: `{0}`
 Use `{1}loadplaylist {0}`
 Or `{1}addplaylist {0}`
 Or `{1}runplaylist {0}`
 Details about the commands can be viewed through `{1}help`
Music.CantConnect: The bot cannot join your voice channel `{0}`
Music.OnlyOneNode: Unfortunately, only the node you are using is available to the bot right now
Music.ResumeViaPlaylists: You can try to replay through `{0}loadplaylist {1}`
Music.WarningEmojiRemoval: ‚ùóThe bot can not remove reactions for users as intended. To do this, he needs permission `MANAGE_MESSAGES`
Music.WarningEmojiAdding: ‚ÄºÔ∏èManagement through reactions is not available - the bot cannot add them to the message. To do this, he needs permission `ADD_REACTIONS`
Music.WarningCustomEmoji: ‚ÄºÔ∏èCustom reactions for a beautiful display of the player are not available for the bot. To do this, he needs permission `USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS`
Music.TrackNotSeekable: {0}, unfortunately this track is not seek-able
Music.TryReconnectAfterDispose:
We are trying to revive the player automatically.
 If we didn't succeed, use `{0}loadplaylist {1}`
Music.ReconnectedAfterDispose: The player has been restarted. We fixed everything. If not, use `{0}stop` and `{0}loadplaylist {1}`
Music.ResolvingTracks: **{0}** made `{1}` requests. Processed `{2}` of them, added `{3}` tracks.
Music.CurrentTrackNonSpotify: The current track is not received from Spotify. Switch to a track from Spotify or provide the track ID as an argument to this command
Music.TrackStuck: The current track is stuck. Let's skip.

Help.HelpPrefix:
Current bot prefix `{0}` or ping ({1}).
You also can get support on our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/zfBffbBbCp).
Help.HelpDescription: Help for all commands and categories
Help.NotFoundDescription: Command `{0}` not found. Type `{1}help` to see all available commands.
Help.userstats0s: Bot command usage statistics by a specific user
Help.userstats1s: Bot command usage statistics by you
Help.shuffle0s: Randomizes the tracks in the queue
Help.help0s: Shows information about a specific command
Help.renderlog0s: Displays the message change history as an image
Help.history0s:
Shows the message change history.
You can also put emotion üìñ under the desired message
Help.history0_0s: ID of the message whose history needs to be displayed. You can also use a pair of `channel ID`-`ID messages`
Help.setprefix0s: Assigns a prefix for bot commands
Help.language0s: Allows you to select the language of the bot's responses
Help.setchannel0s: Specifies the channel that the bot will use for a specific type of message.
Help.play0s: Play music by name or URL
Help.play1s: Play music from an attached file
Help.jump0s: Moves the playhead to the specified number of tracks. Can move back.
Help.goto0s: Moves the playhead to a specific track by its index
Help.clearhistories0s: Clearing all message changes logs from the server
Help.runplaylist0s: Adds the contents of the playlist to the track list and goes to the track specified in the playlist
Help.addplaylist0s: Adds playlist content to track list
Help.loadplaylist0s: Replaces a track list with a playlist
Help.saveplaylist0s: Exports the current track list to a playlist
Help.fastforward0s: Fast forward for a specified time
Help.fastforward0_0s: Amount of time. The default is 10 seconds. For example: `4d3h2m1s`
Help.seek0s: Sets the playing track's position to the specified position
Help.remove0s: Deletes the specified track (or range) from the playlist
Help.remove0_0s: Track number (or the beginning of the range if the second parameter is specified)
Help.bassboost0s: Lets you toggle the bass boost
Help.changenode0s: Attempts to move playback to another music node. May help if current lags
Help.invite0s: Represents a link with which you can invite a bot to a server
Help.logging0s: Shows a message logging control panel
Help.fixspotify0s: Wrong tracks when ordering from Spotify? We need to put an end to this. Together.
Help.fixspotify0_0s: Spotify URL of the desired track
Help.playnext0s: Same as `play`, but adds tracks immediately after the current one, not to the end of the queue

CommandHandler.UnmetPrecondition: You do not have permission to execute this command!
CommandHandler.BadArgCount: Error - the wrong number of arguments for the command. Here's a hint for using the command:
CommandHandler.ParseFailed: An error occurred while trying to parse the command. Here's a hint for using the command:

Commands.RequestedBy: Requested by {0} | Help us by voting

Commands.SetPrefixResponse:
Changed the bot prefix to `{0}`.
If you forget the prefix, just mention the bot.
Commands.CommandLoggingEnabled: Saving history for successful commands enabled
Commands.CommandLoggingDisabled: Saving history for successful commands disabled

MessageHistory.MessageNull:
Failed to get change history: message not found. 
Probable reasons: 
- Wrong ID 
- Message deleted 
- The bot no longer has access to it.
MessageHistory.MessageWithoutHistory:
[Message]({0}) change history not found.
Probable reasons:
- The message was written before the bot appeared on the server
- The bot was offline while writing the message
- The message was written in the log channel
- Logging is turned off (use `logging` command)
MessageHistory.Author: Author
MessageHistory.ChannelDeleted: Channel {0} ({1}) on {2} was deleted. Cleared {3} messages.
MessageHistory.GuildLogCleared: The bot cleared the message history of the guild {0} ({1}). Cleared {2} posts.
MessageHistory.IdFailedToParse:
We cannot recognize the message ID (and channel ID) in `{0}`. 
Correct Input Example:
> {1}history 276780134676037642-728591222217637918
> {1}history 728591222217637918
MessageHistory.DeletedMessagesPackDescription: **Deleted messages whose change history is not found:**

Statistics.Title: Statistics
Statistics.NoGlobalStats: Apparently, no one used the bot üò•. You are the first.
Statistics.NoUserStats: Apparently, {0} did not use the bot.

The bot serves `{0} servers`.
 These are `{1} text` and `{2} voice` channels.
 These are `{3} users`.
Statistics.ByGlobalFormatted1:
This is the `{0} command usages` all time.
 This is the `{1} persons that used the bot`.
Statistics.ByMusicFormatted: The bot played `{0} days`, `{1} hours` and `{2} minutes` of music

Common.InviteDescription: Here is [your link]({0}) for inviting the bot to another server. Hope to meet you there! üòÄ
Common.VoteDescription:
You can **free** support us on:
[top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/606760964183949314) (vote every 12 hours, write a review)
[discordbotlist.com](https://discordbotlist.com/bots/enliven) (vote every 12 hours)
[bots.ondiscord.xyz](https://bots.ondiscord.xyz/bots/606760964183949314) (write a review)
 Or you can just look at [discord.bots.gg](https://discord.bots.gg/bots/606760964183949314)

Do not forget about [our GitLab](https://gitlab.com/enlivenbot/enliven), where you can write errors and suggestions
Also you can join our [Discord support server](https://discord.gg/zfBffbBbCp)

ChainsCommon.Thanks:
The current command chain is complete.
 Thanks for using.
 Support us by using the command `{0} vote`
ChainsCommon.ReasonStartedNew: The current chain of commands is completed, as the new one is launched.
ChainsCommon.ReasonTimeout: The current command chain has ended because the timeout reached
ChainsCommon.CantSend: We cannot complete this action in {0} because we do not have the necessary permissions

Chains.FixSpotifyQueryNotRecognised: We cannot recognize the playlist or track in `{0}`
Chains.FixSpotifyAssociationCreationError: Something went wrong while creating the default association. Try later
Chains.FixSpotifyNotFound: We cannot find anything for this request: `{0}`
Chains.FixSpotifyPlaylistChooseValue:
To choose a track - write index in the next message. For example: 
> 1
Chains.FixSpotifyNewTrackError: No results were found for your query `{0}`, or more than one result was found
Chains.FixSpotifyTrackAlreadyExists: Such an association already exists. You automatically upvote it
Chains.FixSpotifyAssociationChoose:
{0}

To select an association, write its number, for example:
> 1
Fast Association Vote:
> 1 +
Adding an association:
> new `Youtube query or url`
When adding a new association, your previous association (if any) will be deleted

Logging.CommandDisabled: ü§ñ Logging messages containing commands for the bot **disabled** ‚ùå

Logging.HistoryMissingInLogDisabled: ‚ÅâÔ∏è Send message about deleting a message whose change history was not found, **disabled** ‚ùå

> HTML document (faster, recommended)
Logging.OutputToHtml:

> **HTML document** (faster, recommended)
Logging.LogChannelMissing: **not selected**. To select, send a message of the form ```{0}setchannel Log [here is the mention of the desired channel]```
Logging.Info:
üìù To add or remove a channel to the logging, just write a message that contains its mention.
 For example:
> {0}
***Warning:*** enable logging only for really important channels. Each message is a place in the bot storage. The more economical we all will use it, the later I will have to introduce a clear history of old messages. Treat this with understanding
